flawed_nl_solution:
Since 1 hour is 60 minutes, 20 minutes is 20/60=3/1 of an hour.
Eating 3 potatoes per 20 minutes is 3/(3/1)=<<3/(3/1)=1>>1 potatoes per hour.
At 1 potatoes per hour, it will take Jason 27/1=27 hours to eat all of the potatoes.
#### 27

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20/60, not 3/1. It appears the numerator and denominator were swapped.
